long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Guide your ball along intricate pathways, skillfully avoiding hazards, and sprint to the finish line in this physics-based maze runner. With its simple yet captivating gameplay, Roller Baller ensures an enjoyable experience for players of all ages. 🎮

Controls Mastery 🕹️
Hone your control skills to navigate your way to triumph:

🔹 Arrow Keys or WASD: Take command of the ball's movements.
🔹 Maze Navigation: Roll through elaborate mazes, evading obstacles and traps.

How to Conquer the Challenge 🎲
Ready to dominate the maze? Follow these steps:

1️⃣ Choose a Level: Launch Roller Baller and select a level to take on.
2️⃣ Maze Navigation: Utilize the arrow keys or WASD to expertly guide the ball through the maze.
3️⃣ Avoid Obstacles: Sidestep obstacles, traps, and hazards that could impede your progress.
4️⃣ Reach the Finish Line: Successfully navigate the maze, cross the finish line, and unlock the next level.

Explore a variety of thrilling games in the top-left menu. Enjoy your rolling adventure! 🌟
